mapper.select: SELECT 'rcmd' item, B.EMP_NM name, COUNT(*) cnt, B.TITLE title, B.DPTMT dptmt FROM COWK_RCMD_TEST A, EMP_INFO B WHERE A.RCMD_EMP_NO = B.EMP_NO GROUP BY A.RCMD_EMP_NO ORDER BY cnt DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT 'rgs' item, B.EMP_NM name, COUNT(*) cnt, B.TITLE title, B.DPTMT dptmt FROM COWK_RGS_TEST A, EMP_INFO B WHERE A.RGS_EMP_NO = B.EMP_NO GROUP BY A.RGS_EMP_NO ORDER BY cnt DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT 'dptmt' item, B.DPTMT dptmt, COUNT(*) cnt FROM COWK_RCMD_TEST A, EMP_INFO B WHERE A.RCMD_EMP_NO = B.EMP_NO GROUP BY B.DPTMT ORDER BY cnt DESC
